Descripci\u00f3n: Dinosaurs come in many sizes and shapes. Bigger varieties have drab coloration, while smaller dinosaurs have more colorful markings. Most dinosaurs have a pebbly skin texture.

Combate: Dinosaurs take full advantage of their size and speed. The swift carnivores stalk prey, staying hidden in cover until they can get into charge range and rush to the attack. Herbivores frequently overrun and trample their opponents.SEE WIKIPEDIA ENTRY: DinosaurList of DinosaursDeinonychusElasmosaurusMegaraptorTriceratopsTyrannosaurus
